data.title: Organ Historical Society Convention
data.meta_description: The annual Organ Historical Society Convention will be held July 20 - 26 at 550 Light St near the Baltimore Harbor.
data.text:
« All Events

This event has passed.

Organ Historical Society Convention

-

This great event will be headquartered in downtown Baltimore across from the Inner Harbor. During the week they will visit, hear and sing with 25 different instruments, some built in Baltimore during the late 19th century. Fourteen of the 25 instruments are in Catholic churches and institutions. They include the Cathedral of Mary Our Queen, the Basilica of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary, as SS. Philip & James, Shrine of the Little Flower, Saint Ignatius, Corpus Christi Church, Saint Mary’s Seminary & University and more.

About Us

God calls the Catholics of the Archdiocese of Baltimore to be a welcoming, worshipping community of faith, hope, and love. Through his Spirit, the Lord Jesus lives in those who believe, and reaches into our world with his saving message and healing love.
